sen.j: 鍋焼きうどん（なべやきうどん）は、うどんを用いた料理の一種。
sen.e: Nabeyaki-udon is a type of dish which is made by using udon (Japanese wheat noodles).
Nabeyaki-udon is a type of dish which is made by using udon (Japanese wheat noodles).
Nabeyaki-udon is a type of dish which is made by using udon (Japanese wheat noodles).
It is also called "nabeyaki".
It is also called "nabeyaki".
It is also called "nabeyaki."

sen.j: 「焼き」の名を持つが、いわゆる焼きうどんとは全く異なり、実態は鍋料理の範疇に入る。
sen.e: Although it has the name of "yaki" (stir-frying), it is completely different from the so-called yaki udon noodles (stir-fried udon noodles) and is actually in the category of hot pot.
Although it is called "yaki" (stir-frying), it is completely different from the so-called yaki udon noodles (stir-fried udon noodles) and is actually in the category of hot pot.
Although it is called 'yaki' (stir-frying), it is completely different from the so-called yaki udon noodles (stir-fried udon noodles) and is actually in the category of hot pot.

sen.j: 一人用の小型の土鍋や鉄鍋に醤油味のだし汁とうどんを入れ、その上にシイタケ、かまぼこ、ニンジンやネギなどの野菜類、エビの天ぷら、生卵、麩などの具を乗せて煮たもの。
sen.e: Broth flavored with soy sauce and udon noodles are cooked in an individual-sized, small earthenware pot or iron pan, with shiitake mushroom, kamaboko (fish minced and steamed), vegetables such as carrots and onions, shrimp tempura, raw egg, fu (breadlike pieces of wheat gluten), and other ingredients are placed on top.

Broth flavored with soy sauce and udon noodles is cooked in an individual-sized, small earthenware pot or iron pan, with shiitake mushroom, kamaboko (fish minced and steamed), vegetables such as carrots and onions, shrimp tempura, raw egg, fu (breadlike pieces of wheat gluten), and other ingredients are placed on top.

Broth flavored with soy sauce and udon noodles is cooked in an individual-sized, small earthenware pot or iron pan, with shiitake mushroom, kamaboko (fish minced and steamed), vegetables such as carrots and onions, shrimp tempura, raw egg, fu (breadlike pieces of wheat gluten), and other ingredients are placed on top.

sen.j: グツグツと沸騰したまま供し、鍋から直接食べる。
sen.e: It is served while still simmering, and people eat it directly from the pot.
It is served while still simmering, and people eat it directly from the pot.
It is served while still simmering, and people eat it directly from the pot.

sen.j: 具材は多様で卵を伊達巻に代えたり、つみれや蒲鉾を入れる店もある。
sen.e: Various ingredients are used; egg may be replaced with datemaki (a rolled omelet mixed with fish paste), and minced fish and kamaboko may be added in some restaurants.
Various ingredients are used; egg may be replaced with datemaki (a rolled omelet mixed with fish paste), and minced fish and kamaboko may be added in some restaurants.
Various ingredients are used; egg may be replaced with datemaki (a rolled omelet mixed with fish paste), and minced fish and kamaboko may be added in some restaurants.

sen.j: 使い捨て可能なアルミ箔製の鍋に、麺とだし汁、具材をひとまとめにパックした商品も作られている。
sen.e: A product consisting of a set of noodles, broth, and ingredients packed together in a disposable aluminum pan is also available.
A product consisting of a set of noodles, broth, and ingredients packed together in a disposable aluminum pan is also available.
A product consisting of a set of noodles, broth, and ingredients packed together in a disposable aluminum pan is also available.

sen.j: 近年では電磁調理器に対応した商品も登場している。
sen.e: In recent years, products which can be cooked on electromagnetic cookers have also appeared.
In recent years, products that can be cooked on electromagnetic cookers have also appeared.
In recent years, products that can be cooked on electromagnetic cookers have also appeared.

sen.j: 蕎麦屋やうどん屋でも定番のメニューであるが、調理に時間や手間がかかるため、立ち食い形式の店ではほとんど見られない。
sen.e: While it is a regular item on menus at soba noodle restaurants and udon noodle restaurants, it is rarely served at stand-up stalls because cooking it takes time and effort.
While it is a regular item on menus at soba noodle restaurants and udon noodle restaurants, it is rarely served at stand-up stalls because cooking it takes time and effort.
While it is a regular item on menus at soba noodle restaurants and udon noodle restaurants, it is rarely served at stand-up stalls because cooking it takes time and effort.

sen.j: また大部分の店は冬期間のみの提供である。
sen.e: Furthermore, most restaurants serve it only during the winter season.
Furthermore, most restaurants serve it only during the winter season.
Furthermore, most restaurants serve it only during the winter season.

sen.j: 愛媛県松山市内には鍋焼きうどんを出す食堂が多い。
sen.e: In Matsuyama City, Ehime Prefecture, nabeyaki-udon is served in many restaurants.
In Matsuyama City, Ehime Prefecture, nabeyaki-udon is served in many restaurants.
In Matsuyama City, Ehime Prefecture, nabeyaki-udon is served in many restaurants.

sen.j: 市内中心街には老舗店が2店あるほか、市内各地に鍋焼きうどんを出す店がある。
sen.e: In addition to the two long-established restaurants in downtown, restaurants in various locations of the city serve nabeyaki-udon.
In addition to the two long-established restaurants located downtown, restaurants in various locations of the city serve nabeyaki-udon.
In addition to the two long-established restaurants located downtown, restaurants in various locations of the city serve nabeyaki-udon.

sen.j: その特徴として、アルミ鍋（市販の商品で使用される使い捨てタイプのものではなく調理用の小型鍋）、やわらか麺、甘めのだし汁が共通項として挙げられる。
sen.e: Characteristics that are common to these restaurants include an aluminum pan (not the disposable type used in commercially available products but a small pan for cooking), soft noodles, and rather sweet broth.

Characteristics that are common to these restaurants include an aluminum pan (not the disposable types available as commercial products, but a small pan for cooking), soft noodles, and rather sweet broth.

Characteristics that are common to these restaurants include an aluminum pan (not the disposable types available as commercial products, but a small pan for cooking), soft noodles, and rather sweet broth.

sen.j: 2006年秋の地元誌の調べによると120軒余りのうどん店でメニューに載っている。
sen.e: According to a survey conducted by a local magazine in the autumn of 2006, nabeyaki-udon was listed on menus at over 120 restaurants of udon noodles.
According to a survey conducted by a local magazine in the autumn of 2006, nabeyaki-udon was listed on menus at over 120 restaurants that serve udon noodles.
According to a survey conducted by a local magazine in the autumn of 2006, nabeyaki-udon was listed on menus at over 120 restaurants that serve udon noodles.

sen.j: また通年提供する店が多いのも特徴である。
sen.e: Another one of characteristics is that many such restaurants serve nabeyaki-udon throughout the year.
Another characteristic is that many such restaurants serve nabeyaki-udon throughout the year.
